unified_frame_statement: Nina shares her transformation story with Coach Adele, showing how mastering her alimentation helped her overcome paralyzing hypersensitivity and energy crashes, and achieve the clarity to launch her own African fabric brand.

thematic_spr.line_1_hook: Hypersensitivity, Absorbing energies, Victim of environment
thematic_spr.line_2_setup: Nurse logic, Heavy food, Medical doubts
thematic_spr.line_3_challenge: Energy crashes (4/10), Hiding, Fear of madness
thematic_spr.line_4_turning: Alignment, Maman Adele, Food as fuel
